content: The Celestial Taiyi Pill of the Flaming Mountains is hidden in plain sight. Simply look to the left of the Rakshasa Palace Keeper's Shrine to find the pill sitting in a gold chest in the open.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Taiyi_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Taiyi Pill Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Flaming Mountains Celestial Taiyi Pill'.
The content is as follows:
The Celestial Taiyi Pill of the Flaming Mountains is hidden in plain sight. Simply look to the left of the Rakshasa Palace Keeper's Shrine to find the pill sitting in a gold chest in the open.
